Convenioent class wrapping maven process.

Method Detail

of

public static final JkMvn of(java.io.File workingDir,
                             java.lang.String... args)
Creates a Maven command. Separate argument in different string, don't use white space to separate workds. Ex : JkMvn.of(myFile, "clean", "install", "-U").

commands

public final JkMvn commands(java.lang.String... args)
return a new maven command for this working directory. Separate arguments in different strings, don't use white space to separate workds. Ex : withCommand("clean", "install", "-U").
